help-file.text:
BitBot is a game designed for teaching a simple programming language in educational an approach.
The user has the ability to go through tutorials and learn simple programming concepts for the BASIC language.
These tutorials will provide the necessary tools that will be used in programming a BOT.
With these tools the user will be able to create new or edit pre-existing code in the IDE section of the game.
This code is used to complete MISSIONS available to the user in the game.
Upon selecting a MISSION the user will be briefed before making final changes to the BOT.
The user will be able to choose different BOT components along with their desired code for the specific MISSION.
These Selections will be attached to the BOT and sent into the game, where the user will get to see their code in action.
